divs: Sighting DetailsWe were on the porch and the sky was dark and clear.they came from the left over the houses almost parallel to street than over the houses on the right about ten seconds.The color was orange,no sound.There were a long sream that they made.It was about four time their lenght and looked like a thin white sring that wriggle at the ends as they dissipated.I was to young too do anything.But I know it must have been reported.I Been trying to find some Infro for a long time.We were in awe.We did'nt know to what to think.But it was amazing.
Summary: mother and I and others saw two disc ,one laged a little behind.
